code: import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Detail=()=>{const[movie,setMovie]=useState([]);const id=useParams();const getMovie=async()=>{console.log(id["id"]);const response=await fetch("https://nomad-movies.nomadcoders.workers.dev/movies?".concat(id["id"]));const data=await response.json();setMovie(data.find(movie=>movie.id==id["id"]));console.log(data);};useEffect(()=>{getMovie();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:movie.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:movie.backdrop_path,width:"80%"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Rating : ","⭐️".repeat(Math.round(movie.vote_average/2))]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:movie.adult?"Adult":null})]});};export default Detail;
